name: A Night at the Theater
description: Kelis and Voyager's EMH have partnered to create a new theatrical work based on the temporal anomaly crisis--with Barclay in the starring role. When a potential threat to the production arises, can you help the nervous Barclay to overcome it?
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of M'Benga, Kelis, Barclay, or EMH will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: M'Benga, Kelis, Barclay or EMH
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: T'Rina
featured_crew.flavor: As the president of Ni'Var, T'Rina must find a way to preserve the reunification of Vulcans and Romulans as she considers rejoining the Federation.

featured_crew.name: Barclay
featured_crew.flavor: In order to overcome his holodeck addiction, Barclay takes on the role of Cyrano de Bergerac before his shipmates.

action.name: The Moon...Yes, That Will Be My Home

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Kelis
rewards.flavor: Kelis, a playwright, seeks to use his plays as a way to prevent war between rival factions on his home planet.

rewards.name: T'Rina
rewards.flavor: As the president of Ni'Var, T'Rina must find a way to preserve the reunification of Vulcans and Romulans as she considers rejoining the Federation.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: As the president of Ni'Var, T'Rina must find a way to preserve the reunification of Vulcans and Romulans as she considers rejoining the Federation.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

adventures.name: Phaser on the Mantle
adventures.description: Search for weapons in the immediate radius.

adventures.name: In the Wings
adventures.description: Determine if everyone is pleased with the casting.

adventures.name: Body of Evidence
adventures.description: Physical proof to convict the offenders.

rewards.name: A Night at the Theater
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Barclay
rewards.flavor: In order to overcome his holodeck addiction, Barclay takes on the role of Cyrano de Bergerac before his shipmates.

action.name: The Moon...Yes, That Will Be My Home

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Hunt in the name of art with the Hirogen.

screens.text: "Really, Mister Barclay, I'm beginning to regret casting you in the lead role. This play is too important to capturing the moment we're in to leave it to an amateur. Or another writer...."
"You need a voice that wasn't literally programmed by the Federation. Mister Barclay's going to be fine. He's just letting his nerves get the best of him."

"Captain... I promise it's not nerves. I mean, I have them, but they're unrelated to the real threat facing this production. Someone doesn't want this show to go on, and I think they're willing to use violence to make sure it doesn't. Can you help me prove it?"
